Articles.Content:
IDK why this popped up, but thought that maybe have either a laser light part or a light built into a docking port might be nice for looks and docking maneuvers (eliminates the need for chase cam)

also while im here, is it ok if I open up a cancelled content 2nd edition in the ksp discussion (1st edition ended in huge flames requiring community manager intervention) considering 1.0 is nearly here ? ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)
